oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Original wills, Askew, W. F., 1923 January 09
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An original will of W. F. Askew, dated May 18th, 1921. Illustrates the first page of the document. The will cites Askew was “a member of the Masonic Home … all of the above said property to be turned over to the Board of Control to be used by them as they think it would best serve the interest of the Masonic Home of F. & A.M. of Tennessee. After paying my burial expenses. I here appoint W. D. Cranor my executor.” Askew’s will was presented for probate to the Davidson County Court on January 9th, 1923. Forms part of Record Group 16, Original Wills, 1780-1925
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Askew family
